alert.note: Alert for Cameron; Elk; McKean; Northern Centre; Northern Clinton; Northern Lycoming; Potter; Tioga; Warren (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 6:19PM EST until January 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow heavy at times, followed by some mixed precipitation. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, with locally up to 4 inches on the higher terrain north of I-80. Ice accumulations of a light glaze. Southeast winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central Pennsylvania. * WHEN...From 4 PM Friday to 1 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Strong winds could down tree limbs and cause scattered power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow may come down heavily for a period of 2 or 3 hours this evening, before changing over to a wintry mix or light rain and drizzle late tonight.
info.instruction: The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Call 5 1 1 or visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway and traffic conditions. To report snow or ice, post to the NWS State College Facebook page, use Twitter @NWSStateCollege, or visit weather.gov/ctp.
